src:
Alexandra Grant, la nueva novia de Keanu Reeves

05 Nov 2019, 14:29


Conoce quién es Alexandra Grant, la nueva novia del actor Keanu Reeves.



Ella es una artista plática con la que el actor tuvo más de 10 años de amistad.Fuente: Google

El actor Keanu Reeves ( 55 años) ya tiene novia y su nombre es Alexandra Grant (46 años). Ella es una artista plática con la que el actor tuvo más de 10 años de amistad.
Y fue en la alfombra de la gala LACMA Art+ Film (organizada por el Museo de Arte de Los Ángeles) que el actor la presentó frente a toda la prensa.
 

Noticia Relacionada




Alexandra Grant y Keanu Reeves se lucieron en alfombra de la gala LACMA Art+ Film.Fuente: Google

¿Quién es Alexandra Grant?
 Alexandra Grant es una artista y filántropa que exhibido muchas de sus obras en varios países de todo el mundo incluyendo esculturas, pinturas y dibujos.
Según el Daily Mail, Alexandra y Keanu se conocieron en 2009 y desde ese entonces formaron una buena amistad. Luego, en el 2011 empezaron a colaborar juntos en un libro de ilustraciones para adultos llamado Ode to Happiness.
Luego, produjeron un segundo libro, Shadows (publicado en 2016) que incluía poemas escritos por Keanu, así como imágenes que Alexandra.
Ahora, ambos llevan una editorial juntos, X Artists' Books, que fundaron en el año 2017 que se encarga de publicar obras literarias.
Sin duda, ellos pudieron compenetrar la parte laboral con su relación amorosa y ahora lucen radiantes y felices.
 

Noticia Relacionada
text:
Alexandra Grant, Keanu Reeves' new girlfriend

05 Nov 2019, 14:29


Meet who Alexandra Grant is, the new girlfriend of actor Keanu Reeves.



She is a talk artist with whom the actor had more than 10 years of friendship. Source: Google

The actor Keanu Reeves (55 years old) already has a girlfriend and his name is Alexandra Grant (46 years old). She is a talk artist with whom the actor had more than 10 years of friendship.
And it was on the carpet of the LACMA Art + Film gala (organized by the Los Angeles Museum of Art) that the actor presented it in front of the entire press.


Related News




Alexandra Grant and Keanu Reeves wore on the carpet of the LACMA Art + Film gala. Source: Google

Who is Alexandra Grant?
Alexandra Grant is an artist and philanthropist who exhibited many of her works in several countries around the world including sculptures, paintings and drawings.
According to the Daily Mail, Alexandra and Keanu met in 2009 and since then formed a good friendship. Then, in 2011 they started collaborating together on an adult illustration book called Ode to Happiness.
Then, they produced a second book, Shadows (published in 2016) that included poems written by Keanu, as well as images that Alexandra.
Now, both have an editorial together, X Artists' Books, which they founded in 2017 that is responsible for publishing literary works.
Without a doubt, they were able to combine the labor part with their love relationship and now they look radiant and happy.
